text:
OpenSecrets is committed to providing timely reporting and new educational resources in advance of the upcoming elections this year. No paywall or subscription necessary, free information for all people.

In this critical election year, can you commit to making a monthly donation of $24 to support our work? Your gift will help us keep following the money and fighting for government transparency.
title: OpenSecrets

meta_data.description: OpenSecrets is the nation's premier research and government transparency group tracking money in politics and its effect on elections and policy.
